synopsis: In this engaging episode of Pineapple Blot Rotation, hosts Dan and Garrett dive deep into the complex relationship between body image and gym culture. With humor and heartfelt honesty, they explore personal experiences, societal pressures, and the importance of self-acceptance, providing valuable insights on how to cultivate a healthier mindset towards fitness and self-worth.
quotes: The horror is persist, but so do we.
You have to get into the thick of it in order to get out again.
If you don't have that passion or drive to go to the gym, find something active that you are passionate about.
Comparison is the thief of joy.
You shouldn't look at a fitness influencer and say, 'I should be looking like that.'
It's important to separate the gym and the valuable aspects you can get out of that from the negative self-image.
If you're not capable of loving that body you're never going to be capable of loving the body that you're able to turn into.
Drink water, guys. It's my number one piece of advice.
If you set a realistic goal and you hit it, that's a positive reward mechanism.
